name: Suffer in hell
description:
This is Suffer in Hell, it was hell to make it, it is hell to play it.

CONTROLS 

  • W,A,S,D - For moving in hell's arena.
  • SPACE - To transform in to the human bayblade and demage denizens of hell.
  • SHIFT - To move faster and avoid getting push out drom the arena.
  • ESC - To pause a game.

CREDITS

eFko - programing, gamedesign (https://efko.itch.io/)

DevLazy - graphics, initial concept and also made the one and only sound effect in the game. (https://devlazy.itch.io/)

music - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/distorted-doom/1759
